Name: SiNKR 2
About the game: SiNKR 2 is a minimalist puzzle game evolved from the award winning SiNKR. There is just you, hooks, pucks, and various contraptions. SiNKR 2 employs familiar contraptions (square and round holes, kickers, and portals) in new layouts, e.g. spirals; linear and rotational symmetry. Subtle differences within level themes drive different solutions to superficially similar scenarios. Carried over from SiNKR Tutorial levels (no SiNKR experience needed) Advanced levels allow for multiple solutions No scores, no timers, no distractions Responsive ambient soundscape No text, suitable for all languages Improved flow through the game Mini-map level selector with challenge ratings from * to *** Multiple paths to complete the game Skippable levels Playtime 3.5 hours (speedy) to 4.5 hours (relaxed). Thanks for playing and have fun!
Meta Title: SiNKR 2: May 9, 2019, Robert Wahler and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on SiNKR 2? Check out the release date (May 9, 2019), developer insights from Robert Wahler, and a complete game summary.
